--- layout: default ---

The Problem

Cortex 2026 Benchmark Report

90% AI Adoption, Zero Standardization

  • +20% PRs per author, +23.5% incidents per PR, +30% change failure rate

"AI Amplifies Whatever You Have"

  • Good practices become great
  • Bad practices become catastrophic

We've All Seen This

  • My story: Client project with 5000+ line files, 20 components per file, ...
  • UI Engineer using Cursor without understanding the patterns

file.content:
--- theme: ../ layout: default --- # Before We Get Into the "How"...
Let's make this concrete. Think about working with a junior engineer.

The Handoff

1. You scope out the task
2. You hand it off
3. They implement (you're not watching)
4. You review the PR, give feedback

But You Don't Just Wing It

→ Tests that must pass
→ Commit rules & linting
→ GitHub Actions / CI
→ Company protocols
→ Documentation to read first
Working with AI is the same. Encode this information so the AI can operate at scale.

tool_input.old_string: Working with AI is the same. Encode this information so the AI can operate at scale.
tool_input.new_string:
Working with AI is the same.
Encode this information so the AI can operate at scale.

tool_response.newString:

file.content:
--- theme: ../ layout: default clicks: 2 ---

What Skills Do I Need?

Everyone has different workflows

🔧
Backend Dev
API design, DB migrations, testing patterns
🎨
Frontend Dev
Component patterns, debugging, styling
📊
Data Engineer
Pipeline workflows, SQL patterns, ETL
🚀
DevOps
CI/CD, infra-as-code, monitoring
Different roles, different problems, different skills.

I have a lot of skills...

# My actual .claude/ directory
.claude/
├── agents/ (7 files)
├── commands/ (28 files)
├── hooks/ (3 files)
└── skills/ (98 files)
├── agent-session/ (21)
├── browser-mcp/ (5)
├── docs-framework/ (52)
├── git/ (2)
├── prompt-writing/ (10)
└── skill-creator/ (8)
Total: 141 files
But what do I show you?
My workflow is probably not the same as yours.
Everyone is different.

tool_input.old_string: Different roles, different problems, different skills.
tool_input.new_string: DIFFERENT ROLES. DIFFERENT PROBLEMS. DIFFERENT SKILLS.

tool_response.oldString: Different roles, different problems, different skills.
tool_response.newString: DIFFERENT ROLES. DIFFERENT PROBLEMS. DIFFERENT SKILLS.
